page.title: 03Lover Post Office,Redlynch
page.content: {Lover}Post Office is quite near the school.Every year,for{St Valentine's Day,Mrs Southorn prints a special frank mark on 800 to 9oo Valentine cards.She does not frank letters on other days.They go to Salisbury sorting office. This year the frank mark had two doves with hearts and the word{Lover}underneath.Mrs Southorn had the idea of using the frank mark when the Post Office issued a stamp with a heart on it. The sign outside the post office is a red heart with the word {Lover}on it. The post office has a shop with it.You can buy{Lover}souvenirs such as loving cups.It also sells all sorts of things which mothers run out of but sweets sell faster than anything.
